name: google_classroom
description: Google Classroom is a free web service developed by Google for schools that aims to simplify creating, distributing, and grading assignments

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_CLASSROOMS_COURSE_WORK_MATERIALS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list CourseWorkMaterials in a course. Use after confirming a valid courseId; supports pagination and ordering.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkMaterialsListRequest

orderBy.title: Order By
orderBy.description: Requested sorting order. Supported values: 'updateTime asc', 'updateTime desc'.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course whose courseWorkMaterials should be returned.

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return. Must be between 1 and 100. Defaults to 30.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token identifying which page of results to return.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing CourseWorkMaterials in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_ANNOUNCEMENTS_CREATE
tools.description: Tool to create an announcement in a course. Use after confirming the course ID is valid.

inputSchema.title: CoursesAnnouncementsCreateRequest

text.title: Text
text.description: The text content of the announcement.

state.title: State
state.description: State of the announcement; if omitted defaults to PUBLISHED.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

items.title: Material

driveFile.title: Drive File
driveFile.description: Drive file resource with keys like 'id', 'title', 'alternateLink'.

youtubeVideo.title: Youtube Video
youtubeVideo.description: YouTube video resource with keys 'id' and 'title'.

items.description: A material attached to the announcement. Exactly one of the fields should be provided.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: List of materials to attach to the announcement.

assigneeMode.title: Assignee Mode
assigneeMode.description: Mode for assigning the announcement; ALL_STUDENTS or INDIVIDUAL_STUDENTS.

scheduledTime.title: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: RFC3339 timestamp at which to publish the announcement.

studentIds.title: Student Ids
studentIds.description: List of student IDs who can see the announcement.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating an announcement in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_ANNOUNCEMENTS_DELETE
tools.description: Tool to delete an announcement. Use after confirming the announcement ID.

inputSchema.title: CoursesAnnouncementsDeleteRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the announcement to delete.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting an announcement.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_ANNOUNCEMENTS_GET
tools.description: Tool to get an announcement. Use when you need to fetch an announcement by course and announcement ID.

inputSchema.title: CoursesAnnouncementsGetRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the announcement to retrieve.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course. This identifier can be either the Classroom-assigned ID or an alias.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific announcement by course and announcement IDs.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_ANNOUNCEMENTS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list announcements in a course. Use after you have the course ID to page through announcements.

inputSchema.title: CoursesAnnouncementsListRequest

orderBy.title: Order By
orderBy.description: How to sort announcements. Use `updateTime desc` (newest first) or `updateTime asc` (oldest first). Defaults to `updateTime desc`.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course whose announcements should be listed. Can be the Classroom-assigned identifier or an alias.

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of announcements to return. Must be between 1 and 100. Defaults to 30 if not set.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token specifying the next page of results to return. Obtain from a previous list call's `nextPageToken`.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing announcements in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_ANNOUNCEMENTS_PATCH
tools.description: Tool to update fields of an announcement. Use when you need to modify specific details of an existing announcement after confirming which fields to update.

inputSchema.title: CoursesAnnouncementsPatchRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the announcement to update.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text content of the announcement to set.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

items.title: Material

driveFile.title: Drive File
driveFile.description: Drive file resource with keys like 'id', 'title', 'alternateLink'.

youtubeVideo.title: Youtube Video
youtubeVideo.description: YouTube video resource with keys 'id' and 'title'.

items.description: A material attached to the announcement. Exactly one of the fields should be provided.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: List of materials to attach to the announcement.

updateMask.title: Update Mask
updateMask.description: Comma-separated list of fields to update. E.g., 'text,state'.

assigneeMode.title: Assignee Mode
assigneeMode.description: Mode for assigning the announcement; ALL_STUDENTS or INDIVIDUAL_STUDENTS.

scheduledTime.title: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: RFC3339 timestamp at which to publish the announcement.

studentIds.title: Student Ids
studentIds.description: List of student IDs who can see the announcement.

inputSchema.description: Request model for patching an announcement in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_CREATE
tools.description: Tool to create a new course. Use when a teacher needs to establish a Classroom course before enrollment.

inputSchema.title: CoursesCreateRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the course. Max length 750 characters.

room.title: Room
room.description: Room location for the course. Max length 64 characters.

ownerId.title: Owner Id
ownerId.description: Identifier of the course owner. Can be the user's numeric ID or email address.

section.title: Section
section.description: Section of the course. Max length 2800 characters.

description.title: Description
examples: This course covers foundational concepts in algebra, geometry, and problem-solving.
description.description: Detailed description of the course. Max length 30,000 characters.

descriptionHeading.title: Description Heading
descriptionHeading.description: Heading for the course description. Max length 360 characters.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new Google Classroom course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_DELETE
tools.description: Tool to delete a course. Use when you need to remove a course after confirming the course ID.

inputSchema.title: CoursesDeleteRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the course to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_GET
tools.description: Tool to get details for a specific course. Use when you need full course information by ID.

inputSchema.title: CoursesGetRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the course. This identifier can be either the Classroom-assigned ID or an alias.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific course by ID.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list all courses accessible to the authenticated user. Use when you need a paginated list of courses.

inputSchema.title: CoursesListRequest

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return. Must be ≥1.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token identifying the page of results to return.

studentId.title: Student Id
studentId.description: Restricts returned courses to those in which the student is enrolled. Can be the user's numeric ID or 'me'.

teacherId.title: Teacher Id
teacherId.description: Restricts returned courses to those taught by the teacher. Can be the user's numeric ID or 'me'.

courseStates.title: Course States
courseStates.description: Restricts returned courses to those in specified states.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing courses accessible to the user.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_PATCH
tools.description: Tool to update one or more fields of a Classroom course. Use after retrieving course details and confirming fields to update.

inputSchema.title: CoursesPatchRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the course to update.

ownerId.title: Owner Id
ownerId.description: New owner user ID for the course.

updateMask.title: Update Mask
updateMask.description: Comma-separated list of fields to update. E.g., 'name,section'.

description.title: Description
description.description: New detailed description of the course.

descriptionHeading.title: Description Heading
descriptionHeading.description: New heading for the course description.

inputSchema.description: Request model for patching a Course. Only specified fields in updateMask will be changed.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_STUDENTS_GUARDIANS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list guardians of a student in a course. Use when you need to retrieve and paginate guardians for a given student in a course.

inputSchema.title: CoursesStudentsGuardiansListRequest

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course. Can be the Classroom-assigned ID or an alias.

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of guardians to return. Must be between 1 and 100. Defaults to server's default.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token identifying which page of results to return.

studentId.title: Student Id
studentId.description: Identifier of the student (the user's id or email address, or 'me').

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing guardians of a student in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_STUDENTS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list students in a course. Use after you have the course ID to page through enrolled students.

inputSchema.title: CoursesStudentsListRequest

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course whose students should be listed. Can be the Classroom-assigned identifier or an alias.

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of students to return. Must be between 1 and 100.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token specifying which page of results to return. Obtain from a previous list call's `nextPageToken`.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing students in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_TEACHERS_GET
tools.description: Tool to get teacher enrollment. Use when you need to retrieve a specific teacher in a course by courseId and userId.

inputSchema.title: CoursesTeachersGetRequest

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

userId.title: User Id
userId.description: Identifier of the teacher to retrieve. Can be the teacher's numeric user ID or email address.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course. This identifier can be either the Classroom-assigned ID or an alias.

quotaUser.title: Quota User
quotaUser.description: Arbitrary string assigned to a user for quota purposes (server-side applications only).

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a teacher by course and user IDs.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_TEACHERS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list teachers in a course. Use after you have the course ID to page through enrolled teachers.

inputSchema.title: CoursesTeachersListRequest

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course whose teachers should be listed.

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of teachers to return. Must be between 1 and 100.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token specifying which page of results to return.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing teachers in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_TOPICS_CREATE
tools.description: Tool to create a course topic. Use when you need to organize course content into named sections.

inputSchema.title: CoursesTopicsCreateRequest

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course to create the topic in.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a course topic.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_TOPICS_DELETE
tools.description: Tool to delete a course topic. Use when you need to remove a topic from a course after confirming the course and topic IDs.

inputSchema.title: CoursesTopicsDeleteRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the topic to delete.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a course topic.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_TOPICS_GET
tools.description: Tool to get a course topic. Use when you need to retrieve details of a specific course topic by ID after confirming the course and topic IDs.

inputSchema.title: CoursesTopicsGetRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the topic to retrieve.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course. This can be the Classroom-assigned identifier or an alias.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a course topic.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_TOPICS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list topics in a course. Use when you have confirmed the courseId and need to retrieve its topics.

inputSchema.title: CoursesTopicsListRequest

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course (Classroom-assigned ID or alias).

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of topics to return; zero means no limit.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token identifying which page of results to return.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing topics in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSES_TOPICS_PATCH
tools.description: Tool to update fields of a course topic. Use when you need to rename a topic after confirming its current details.

inputSchema.title: CoursesTopicsPatchRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: New display name of the topic.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

updateMask.title: Update Mask
updateMask.description: Comma-separated list of fields to update. Currently only 'name' supported.

inputSchema.description: Request model for patching a course topic.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_CREATE
tools.description: Tool to create a CourseWork item in a course. Use when you need to assign an assignment or question to students immediately or on a schedule.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkCreateRequest

state.title: State
state.description: Whether to save as draft or publish immediately

dueDate.title: DueDate
dueDate.description: Date portion of coursework due date (year, month, day).

dueTime.title: DueTime
dueTime.description: Time portion of coursework due time (hours, minutes, seconds, nanos).

topicId.title: Topic Id
topicId.description: Topic ID to organize coursework under

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: Materials to attach to the coursework

maxPoints.title: Max Points
maxPoints.description: Maximum points available for the coursework

assignment.title: Assignment
assignment.description: Assignment details if workType is ASSIGNMENT

scheduledTime.title: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: RFC3339 timestamp to auto-publish the coursework

grading.title: Grading
grading.description: Additional grading options for short answer questions

choices.title: Choices
choices.description: List of possible answers; provide at least two choices

submissionModificationMode.title: Submission Modification Mode
submissionModificationMode.description: Controls if students can edit submissions after turn-in

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new CourseWork item.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_DELETE
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific CourseWork. Use when you need to remove a coursework item from a course after confirming the IDs.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkDeleteRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the coursework item to delete.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a specific CourseWork.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_GET
tools.description: Tool to get details of a specific coursework. Use when detailed information about a particular assignment is needed.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkGetRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the coursework item to retrieve.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course. This identifier can be either the Classroom-assigned identifier or an alias.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific coursework by course and coursework IDs.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list coursework in a course. Use after verifying courseId.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkListRequest

orderBy.title: Order By
orderBy.description: Sort ordering for results. Comma-separated list of fields with optional direction. Supported fields: 'updateTime', 'dueDate'. Supported direction keywords: 'asc', 'desc'. Default: 'updateTime desc'.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course (Classroom-assigned ID or alias).

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return. Zero or unspecified indicates the server may assign a maximum. The server may return fewer than the specified number.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: NextPageToken from a previous list call, indicating subsequent page of results to return. Must be used with otherwise identical request.

previewVersion.title: Preview Version
previewVersion.description: Preview version of the API. Set to access new capabilities in the Preview Program.

courseWorkStates.title: Course Work States
courseWorkStates.description: Restriction on the coursework state to return. Only coursework matching one of these states is returned. If unspecified, defaults to ['PUBLISHED'].

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing coursework in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_MATERIALS_CREATE
tools.description: Tool to create course work material. Use when adding resources or notes to a course.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkMaterialsCreateRequest

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the course work material.

topicId.title: Topic Id
topicId.description: Identifier of the topic to which this material belongs.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

items.title: Material

driveFile.title: Drive File
driveFile.description: Drive file resource with keys like 'id', 'title', 'alternateLink'.

youtubeVideo.title: Youtube Video
youtubeVideo.description: YouTube video resource with keys 'id' and 'title'.

items.description: A material attached to the course work material. Exactly one of the fields should be provided.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: Materials attached to the course work material. Each element defines one of driveFile, link, form, or youtubeVideo.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the course work material.

assigneeMode.title: Assignee Mode
assigneeMode.description: Who can see the material. Defaults to ALL_STUDENTS.

scheduledTime.title: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: RFC3339 formatted time when the material is scheduled to be published, e.g., '2020-10-28T16:01:23Z'.

associatedWithDeveloper.title: Associated With Developer
associatedWithDeveloper.description: Whether this material is associated with a developer project.

studentIds.title: Student Ids
studentIds.description: List of student IDs who can see the material.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating course work material in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_MATERIALS_GET
tools.description: Tool to get a coursework material. Use when you need to retrieve details of a specific coursework material by course and material ID.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkMaterialsGetRequest

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course. Can be Classroom-assigned identifier or an alias.

inputSchema.description: Request model for getting a coursework material.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_MATERIALS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list course work materials in a course. Use when you need to retrieve and paginate materials for a given courseId.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkMaterialsListRequest

orderBy.title: Order By
orderBy.description: Optional sorting order; allowed values are 'updateTime asc' or 'updateTime desc'.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course whose courseWorkMaterials should be returned.

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return. Must be between 1 and 100. Defaults to 30.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token identifying which page of results to return.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing CourseWorkMaterials in a course.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_PATCH
tools.description: Tool to update fields of a CourseWork. Use when you need to modify specific details of an existing coursework after confirming which fields to update.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkPatchRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the CourseWork to update.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the coursework to set.

year.title: Year
year.description: Year of due date in YYYY format

hours.title: Hours
hours.description: Hour of due time in 24h format (0-23)

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course. Can be the Classroom-assigned identifier or an alias.

maxPoints.title: Max Points
maxPoints.description: Maximum grade points for the coursework.

updateMask.title: Update Mask
updateMask.description: Comma-separated list of fields to update. E.g., 'title,description'.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the coursework to set.

scheduledTime.title: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: Timestamp in RFC3339 format to set for scheduledTime.

inputSchema.description: Request model for patching a CourseWork.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_STUDENT_SUBMISSIONS_LIST
tools.description: Tool to list student submissions for a specific coursework. Use when you need to fetch or paginate student submissions by course and coursework, optionally filtering by user, state, or timeliness.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkStudentSubmissionsListRequest

late.title: Late
late.description: Filters returned submissions to those that are on time or late.

states.title: States
states.description: Filters returned submissions to those in the specified states.

userId.title: User Id
userId.description: Restricts returned submissions to those owned by the specified user. Use numeric ID or 'me'.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

pageSize.title: Page Size
pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return. Defaults to 30; maximum is 100.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token for next page of results.

courseWorkId.title: Course Work Id
courseWorkId.description: Identifier of the coursework; use '-' to return submissions for all coursework in the course.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing StudentSubmissions of a coursework.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_COURSE_WORK_STUDENT_SUBMISSIONS_RECLAIM
tools.description: Tool to reclaim a student submission for editing. Use after a student requests to edit their turned-in submission, resetting its state to CREATED.

inputSchema.title: CourseWorkStudentSubmissionsReclaimRequest

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course.

inputSchema.description: Request model for reclaiming a student submission for editing.

tools.name: GOOGLE_CLASSROOM_INVITATIONS_CREATE
tools.description: Tool to create an invitation for a user to a course. Use after confirming the course ID is valid.

inputSchema.title: InvitationsCreateRequest

role.title: Role
role.description: Role to invite the user as.

userId.title: User Id
userId.description: Identifier of the user to invite. Can be the user's numeric ID or email address.

courseId.title: Course Id
courseId.description: Identifier of the course to invite the user to.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating an invitation for a user to join a course.
